content: laurel is a sweet girl ready for adventure she is perfection from the tip of her sweet head to those adorable little feet she is so fun to crochet pattern includes detail instructions on how to make doll construct and style her hair how to position her eyes and nose this doll has all the little details a specially designed reinforcement inside the head to help stabilize the neck nicely constructed feet with top of the foot definition and perfectly designed hands and arms adorable well-fitting dress and shoes great for gift giving but also perfect for adult collectors this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level intermediate size approximately 11 5 tall materials needed - worsted weight yarn exact brand and colors included - crochet hook size g 6/4 0 mm - safety eyes - fiberfill - tapestry needle - 2 small buttons and sewing needle & thread for sewing them on the dress pattern is written in english using standard american terms > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/laurel-crochet-doll/
